name: The Last Job (GabaWrightMusic)
description:
The year is 1982, and you're an independent thief who is being offered one of the biggest payouts of your career. A contractor has employed your services, along with your trusted ground partner, to infiltrate one of Monaco's biggest casinos. Your mission? To locate, acquire, and escape with mysterious 'documents' from a locked safe in the casino's penthouse and deliver them to your contractor. 

The only clue you have is that to acquire the necessary keys required to unlock the safe, you are to look for a man with a large, gold cygnet ring who will be in the casino tonight. After acquiring the keys, uncover information and make your way to the penthouse. Finally, after avoiding the security and fulfilling your mission, you can finally claim your money and retire somewhere peaceful in France without a care in the world.

Piece the clues together, play some casino games, avoid capture, and pull off this one last job!
